text:
Hi,

I would like to submit enhancement for batik SVG DOM  in regards default attribute.

Because batik always (for certain element) add default attribute, this
enhancement allows whether the default attribute is/are generated or not by
setting the flag on ExtensibleSVGDOMImplementation.setInitializeAttribute(boolean).
The default value is true to keep backward compatible

check the attached cvs.diff file


Regards
Tonny Kohar

text:
If you don't want these on output then you should check
'org.w3c.dom.Attr#getSpecified()' this will return false
for the attributes in question.  I think this is a much
better approach than producing an incorrect DOM.

It may be a good idea for the serializers to have an
option to inhibit the output of these attributes.
creator: deweese@apache.org
